Developers Guide¶

Mozhi developers environment comes with following options:

  • Running everything on local machine

  • Running everything on Docker containers and port forwarding to host machine as needed

  • Run inside the Kubernetes cluster

  • Hybrid combinations

OS Tools and Frameworks:
